mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resources ( title, tags, file_type, file_path, file_size, description, content_hash, uploaded_by, upload_time, chunk_count, vectorized ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{tags}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{description}, #{contentHash}, #{uploadedBy}, #{uploadTime}, #{chunkCount}, #{vectorized} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, tags, file_type, file_path, file_size, description, content_hash, uploaded_by, upload_time, chunk_count, vectorized FROM resources WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, tags, file_type, file_path, file_size, description, content_hash, uploaded_by, upload_time, chunk_count, vectorized FROM resources WHERE content_hash = #{contentHash}

SELECT id, title, tags, file_type, file_path, file_size, description, content_hash, uploaded_by, upload_time, chunk_count, vectorized FROM resources WHERE uploaded_by = #{uploadedBy} ORDER BY upload_time DESC

SELECT id, title, tags, file_type, file_path, file_size, description, content_hash, uploaded_by, upload_time, chunk_count, vectorized FROM resources ORDER BY upload_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
